description: As a User I want to crate orders with the available compartments
name: Verify that the compartments are available when Minimum requirements are met

elements.name: Verify that 4-seat compartments is only available when a Minimum of 2 persons are in cart

steps.name: I am logged in to reservations2 'uat'
I attempt to create an order selecting '2' adult for when choosing who
The '4-seat compartment' compartments are displayed in the select reservation modal
I attempt to create an order selecting '1' adult for when choosing who

result.error_message:

    at eval (node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/asyncToGenerator.js:27:0)
at new Promise (<anonymous>)
    at eval (node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/asyncToGenerator.js:19:0)

steps.name: The '4-seat compartment' compartments are not displayed in the select reservation modal

elements.name: Verify that Joan Pullman Observation seat is only available when a Minimum of 1 persons are in cart

steps.name: I am logged in to reservations2 'uat'
I attempt to create an order selecting '1' adult for when choosing who
The 'Joan Pullman Observation seat' compartments are displayed in the select reservation modal

elements.name: Verify that 6-seat compartments are only available when a Minimum of 4 persons are in cart
